alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 10:25AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 1115 AM MST... At 1024 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Estrella Mountain Park, or 9 miles southeast of Goodyear, moving northwest at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Glendale, Surprise, Avondale, Goodyear, Buckeye, El Mirage, Tolleson, Youngtown, Sun City West, Waddell, Cashion, Sun City, Litchfield Park, Perryville, White Tank Mountain Park, Luke AFB, Beardsley, Liberty, Phoenix International Raceway and Surprise Stadium. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 111 and 135. US Highway 60 between mile markers 134 and 146. AZ Route 101 between mile markers 2 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Tonopah Desert
